overview:
blogSpirit edits and operates blogs and online conversation services since 2004: blogSpirit targets B2C, B2B and institutional markets with tailor-made solutions adapted to every single context:

A range of blogging services tailored to meet the needs of all categories of Clients, from end users to large enterprises:

blogSpirit has an international presence via a network of partner agencies and resellers in UK, Belgium, Switzerland, Italy and Spain.
